amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount appropriated to the Peace Corps (Independent Agencies) by $76,560,000 to match the President's request of $373,440,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 111-193 to reduce the amount appropriated to the Peace Corps (Independent Agencies) by $76,560,000 to match the President's request of $373,440,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 259 (Roll no. 518).
